name: TencentCloudCustomer
summary: Tencent Cloud Smart Customer Service UIKit on Customer Side.
description: Tencent Cloud Desk, leveraging Tencent's extensive experience in instant messaging and artificial intelligence, offers an all-in-one customer service solution for businesses. You can seamlessly integrate this AI-based customer service system into your corporate website, mobile apps, and Wechat mini-programs, enhancing the efficiency of services provided to your users. Furthermore, built on the robust Tencent Cloud Chat platform, Desk provides developers with advanced Instant Messaging capabilities and open APIs, enabling tailored solutions to meet specific business requirements.
